Parameters:

getMaterial

public Material getMaterial()
Get a copy of the current Material object for this Appearance.

Returns:
a copy of the Material object, or null if none has been set.

setTexture

Record a reference to the specified texture object, in this Appearance object.

Parameters:
texture - The new texture to use for this Appearance object.

getTexture

public Texture getTexture()
Get a reference to the current texture object for this Appearance.

Returns:
a copy of the Texture object, or null if none has been set.

setShadeModel

public void setShadeModel(int shade_model)
Set the shade model to be GL_SMOOTH, GL_FLAT or GL_NONE to just use the shade model currently set in OpenGL. Invalid values are ignored.

Parameters:
shade_model - Specify the shade model to use for this appearance as GL.GL_SMOOTH or GL.GL_FLAT, GL.GL_NONE.

getShadeModel

public int getShadeModel()
Get a the current shade model set for this appearance object.

Returns:
one of GL.GL_SMOOTH, GL.GL_FLAT or GL.GL_NONE.

setPolygonMode

public void setPolygonMode(int polygon_mode)
Set the mode for surfaces to be GL_POINT, GL_LINE, GL_FILL or GL_NONE. If GL_NONE is specified, the polygon mode will NOT be changed from the previous polygon mode.

Parameters:
polygon_mode - Specify the polygon_mode to use when drawing as GL.GL_POINT or GL.GL_LINE, GL.GL_FILL or GL.GL_NONE.

getPolygonMode

public int getPolygonMode()
Get the current current polygon mode for this appearance object.

Returns:
one of GL.GL_POINT, GL.GL_LINE, GL.GL_FILL, or GL.GL_NONE.

preRender

public void preRender(net.java.games.jogl.GLDrawable drawable)
Use OpenGL calls to set up GL to use the different parts of this appearance object.

Parameters:
drawable - The drawable for which the material properties are set.

postRender

public void postRender(net.java.games.jogl.GLDrawable drawable)
Use OpenGL calls to set up GL to reset the texture state

Parameters:
drawable - The drawable for which the material properties are set.
